course_description: This course will explore Dispute Resolution with an emphasis on negotiation, mediation, and arbitration processes. Course objectives include an overview of these processes as a complement to litigation as well as the study of and training in the skill sets used in each of the processes by advocates as well as neutrals.
sections: Class Nbr: 1691, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: W. Logue, Status: Open
